dating.post: Don’t be crazy If the pope is the owner of the cloth he has to have influence and responsibility for the cloth and in particular the tests  and if necessary limit tests, other-wise if it was left  to the scientist’s discretion and unbelievers there would be little if any-thing left after they had finished testing.He just cannot relinquish care and responsibility for if he is the owner it is actually the church and he the spokes-person.and care-taker.
dating.title: Should Pope Francis Call for New Test?
